form.label: Zeek Files (V1.0)
form.description: V1 Additions: First generation of dashboard

single.title: Total Zeek File Logs (Excluding Known Scanners)

search.query: index= sourcetype="zeek:files:json" NOT [| inputlookup Known_Scanners.csv | rename scannerip AS id.orig_h | table id.orig_h | format] AND analyzers="MD5" | stats count

index= sourcetype="zeek:files:json" NOT [| inputlookup Known_Scanners.csv | rename scannerip AS id.orig_h | table id.orig_h | format] AND analyzers="MD5" | stats count by attachment_type, file_name, md5 | eval file_name=lower(file_name) | where like (file_name, "%.ps1") OR like (file_name, "%.exe") | sort by -count | rename attachment_type AS "File Type", file_name AS Filename, md5 AS MD5, count AS Count

index= sourcetype="zeek:files:json" NOT [| inputlookup Known_Scanners.csv | rename scannerip AS id.orig_h | table id.orig_h | format] AND analyzers="MD5" | stats count by attachment_type, file_name, md5 | eval file_name=lower(file_name) | where like (file_name, "%.txt") | where !like (file_name, "json.txt") AND !like (file_name, "windows\temp\fstmp\fs_smbfile_%.%.%.%-%.txt") | sort by -count | rename attachment_type AS "File Type", file_name AS Filename, md5 AS MD5, count AS Count

index= sourcetype="zeek:files:json" NOT [| inputlookup Known_Scanners.csv | rename scannerip AS id.orig_h | table id.orig_h | format] AND analyzers="MD5" | stats count by attachment_type, file_name, md5, src, dest, dest_port | eval file_name=lower(file_name) | where like (file_name, "$T-Filename$") | sort by -count | rename attachment_type AS "File Type", file_name AS Filename, md5 AS MD5, count AS Count, src AS "Source IP", dest AS "Destination IP", dest_port AS "Destination Port"

index= sourcetype="zeek:files:json" NOT [| inputlookup Known_Scanners.csv | rename scannerip AS id.orig_h | table id.orig_h | format] AND analyzers="MD5" | stats count by attachment_type, file_name, md5, src, dest, dest_port | eval file_name=lower(file_name) | where like (md5, "$T-MD5$") | sort by -count | rename attachment_type AS "File Type", file_name AS Filename, md5 AS MD5, count AS Count, src AS "Source IP", dest AS "Destination IP", dest_port AS "Destination Port"
